channel.title: Projects on Agnes Augustine
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Agnes Augustine

item.title: Project 1: Early Lightning detection using Machine Learning
item.description: We used data from weather API to predict occurence of lightning. This was built as a part of Smart India Hackathon 2019. We used Decion Trees to make the prediction.

item.title: Project 2 : Which countries spent more time on Kaggle?
item.description: Data from kaggle . Explored and analysed data to get some insights from survey data. Link to Kaggle notebook

item.title: Project 3: EDA:Effect of diet and happiness on Covid19
item.description: Data from kaggle . Explored and analysed data to get some insights from different datasets. # Link to Kaggle notebook

item.title: Project 4: Exploratory Data Analysis on Cardamom price data
item.description: Data was scraped from Spicesboard website. Seaborn was used with Python. Visualizations helped us to extract insights and patterns from data. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 5 :Exploratory Data Analysis on Covid19 data from John Hopkins
item.description: Data from kaggle . Explored and analysed data to get some insights about Covid19. Link to Kaggle notebook

item.title: Project 6: Wine Classification using MLP classifier
item.description: Simple neural network for classification Class imbalances are managed. Explored loss curve and confusion matrix. # Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 7 :Regression on housing price data
item.description: Bank data from Kaggle was used . Linear Regressor, SGD Regressor and Random Forest Regressor were trained on same data. Link to GitHub Repository
